SEARCH
Package edu.newsbot

Class NewsBot

java.lang.Object
edu.newsbot.NewsBot
public class NewsBot extends Object
The NewsBot class represents the main functionality for a Telegram bot. It includes methods for sending messages, handling user commands, and managing bot properties.

This class uses the Telegram Bot API to interact with users by sending messages, processing commands, and responding to user actions. It requires a bot.properties file with a valid Telegram bot token to authenticate API requests.

  • Constructor Details

    • NewsBot

      public NewsBot()

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String message, long userId, String replyMarkupJson)
      Sends a message to a user with optional reply markup (inline or reply telegram keyboard) in JSON format.
      Parameters:
      message - The message text to be sent.
      userId - The telegram user ID to whom the message will be sent.
      replyMarkupJson - The JSON string representing the reply markup (keyboard).

    • deleteMessage

      public static void deleteMessage(long userId, long messageId)
      Deletes a message for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The telegram user ID from whom the message will be deleted.
      messageId - The ID of the message to delete.

    • editMessage

      public static void editMessage(String newText, long userId, long messageId, String replyMarkupJson)
      Edits an existing message.
      Parameters:
      newText - The new text to replace the existing message.
      userId - The user ID for whom the message will be edited.
      messageId - The ID of the message to edit.
      replyMarkupJson - JSON string for the new reply markup (keyboard) to be attached with the edited message.

    • getLanguageKeyboardArray

      public static String getLanguageKeyboardArray()
      Generates a keyboard layout for selecting language preferences.
      Returns:
      A JSON string representing the keyboard layout for language selection.

    • getAgeKeyboardArray

      public static String getAgeKeyboardArray()
      Generates a keyboard layout for selecting age groups.
      Returns:
      A JSON string representing the keyboard layout for age group selection.

    • getDeltaTimeKeyboardArray

      public static String getDeltaTimeKeyboardArray()
      Generates a keyboard layout for selecting update frequency (delta time).
      Returns:
      A JSON string representing the keyboard layout for delta time selection.

    • getSourcesKeyboardArray

      public static String getSourcesKeyboardArray()
      Generates a keyboard layout for selecting news sources (In future will be replaced by webhook query search).
      Returns:
      A JSON string representing the keyboard layout for source selection.

    • getNewsKeyboardArray

      public static String getNewsKeyboardArray(boolean isFullArticle, boolean isFirstAfterParsing, boolean isSettings)
      Generates a keyboard layout for navigating through news articles.
      Parameters:
      isFullArticle - Indicates if the full article is displayed. Useful for showing a "More Info" button.
      isFirstAfterParsing - True if it's the first article shown after parsing, enabling a "Read Articles" button instead of "Next Article".
      isSettings - True if settings options should be displayed, which includes "Change ..." buttons without news navigation, useful when there's no new news to display.
      Returns:
      JSON string representing the keyboard layout for news navigation.

    • handleRegistration

      public static void handleRegistration(long userId, boolean language, boolean age, boolean sources, boolean deltaTime)
      Handles the registration process for a new user by guiding through language, age, source, and update frequency selections.
      Parameters:
      userId - The telegram user ID undergoing the registration/settings update process.
      language - Whether the language selection has been completed.
      age - Whether the age selection has been completed.
      sources - Whether the source selection has been completed.
      deltaTime - Whether the delta time selection has been completed.

    • checkAndRunRegistration

      public static boolean checkAndRunRegistration(long userId)
      Checks user registration status and triggers registration flow if necessary. It verifies if the user's information is complete; otherwise, it initiates the registration process.
      Parameters:
      userId - The telegram user ID.
      Returns:
      true if the registration process is initiated due to incomplete information, false if the user's information is already complete.

    • processData

      public static void processData(String data, long userId, Long messageId, String messageText)
      Processes incoming data from the user, handling various commands and interactions.
      Parameters:
      data - The command or data received from the reply/inline keyboard.
      userId - The telegram user ID.
      messageId - The unique identifier of the message (if applicable).
      messageText - The text of the message received from the user (used for deactivation of inline keyboard after first use).

    • getUpdates

      public static void getUpdates()
      Continuously checks for and processes new updates from the messaging platform. This method implements long polling to receive updates and acts upon them.

    • closeClient

      public static void closeClient()
      Safely closes the client connection to the messaging platform. Ensures resources are freed and the client is properly disposed of.
